actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-13.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-13) Authorizes additional expenditures by the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation for inquiries and investigations, not to exceed $2,627,800 from the period from March 1, 1979, through February 29, 1980. Directs that such expenditures be made from the contingent fund of the Senate. Directs the committee to report its findings and recommendations to the Senate no later than February 29, 1980.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation for inquiries and investigations.
